articles.title: Kim Jong Il Inspects Sub-Unit of KPA Tank Division
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Inspects Sub-Unit of KPA Tank Division
Pyongyang, January 5 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il inspected a sub-unit of the Seoul Ryu Kyong Su 105 Guards Tank Division of the KPA honored with the title of O Jung Hup-led Seventh Regiment.
					 He congratulated the service personnel for having performed laudable feats after commencing the fulfilment of their combat duties for this year with fresh confidence and hope.
					
					 After acquainting himself with the unit's performance of duty, he went round an education room, a bedroom, a mess hall, a non-staple food store, a wash-cum-bath house and entertainment and educational and supply service facilities to pay deep attention to their service and living.
					
					 He showed profound loving care for them, learning about every aspect of their life ranging from the use of entertainment and educational means and the bedroom's temperature to the supply of water to the wash-cum-bath house and varieties of non-staple food.
					
					 Noting that it is an important work for boosting their combat capability to provide the soldiers with good conditions for their living, he underlined the need for the commanding officers to pay deep attention to the supply service at all times. 
					
					 Then he mounted the forward observation post to watch tanks in training.
					
					 After seeing the training of brave tank men, he expressed great satisfaction over the fact that all tank men have grown to be a-match-for-a hundred fighters fully prepared politically and ideologically and in military technique to beat back any formidable enemy's invasion at one blow. He set forth important tasks which would serve as guidelines for boosting the unit's combat capability in every way.
					
					 The Seoul Ryu Kyong Su 105 Guards Tank Division which played the role of a pedigree unit in developing the tank force of the DPRK has always been a guards unit in battles and in terms of ideology, he said, adding that the Korean revolution has won one victory after another, weathering manifold trials as such loyal guards units as the above-said division have firmly defended the party and the leader.
					
					 He expressed great expectation that the service personnel of the unit would perform shining feats at the posts for defending the country before having a photo session with them.
					
					 He was accompanied by KPA General Hyon Chol Hae and other commanding officers of the army.

articles.title: Rason City Designated as Municipality
articles.content:
Rason City Designated as Municipality
 Pyongyang, January 5 (KCNA) -- Rason City was designated as a municipality.
					 The Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK said in its decree promulgated on Jan. 4:
					
					1. Rason City shall become a municipality.
					
					2. The DPRK Cabinet and relevant organs shall take practical measures to implement the decree.

articles.title: Cuban Embassy Visit Pyongyang Maternity Hospital
articles.content:
Cuban Embassy Visit Pyongyang Maternity Hospital
Pyongyang, January 5 (KCNA) -- Bianka Rodriguez Suero, charge d'affaires ad interim, and staff members of the Cuban embassy here visited the Pyongyang Maternity Hospital Tuesday on the occasion of the 51st anniversary of the victory in the Cuban revolution. 
					Being briefed on the fact that the maternity hospital was built under the warm loving care of President Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il, the guests looked round different places including treatment rooms and wards.
					
					 Bianka Rodriguez Suero said that the visit helped her to know better about the popular policy of the Workers' Party of Korea and the government of the DPRK.
					
					 Such splendid maternity hospital for women and babies could be built only in the DPRK where man is held dearest, she said, adding:
					
					 Kim Jong Il ensures that lots of ultra-modern medical facilities, medicines and tonics are sent to the hospital.
					
					 Airplanes fly for triplets and they receive gold rings and silver  knives in the DPRK.
					
					 She expressed belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between Cuba and the DPRK would grow stronger in all fields.

articles.title: Korean People Launch into New Year's Advance
articles.content:
Korean People Launch into New Year's Advance
 Pyongyang, January 5 (KCNA) -- Entering the new year Juche 99 (2010) after spending a year of great victory, the entire people of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea have turned out to carry through the important tasks set forth in the joint New Year editorial of the country's leading newspapers.
					 The working people in the sectors of light industry and agriculture, main fronts in improving the people's living standard, have gained achievements from the beginning of the year in hearty response to the joint editorial calling for bringing about a radical turn in the people's standard of living by accelerating the development of light industry and agriculture once again this year that marks the 65th anniversary of the founding of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					 The workers of the Pyongyang Cornstarch Factory, Pyongyang Textile Mill, Wonsan Shoes Factory, Sinuiju Cosmetics Factory and other light industry factories are directing much effort to boosting the production of tasty and highly nutritive foodstuffs and various kinds of daily necessities to supply them to people.
					
					 The agricultural workers are vigorously pushing ahead with preparations for this year's farming including production of organic fertilizer and its transportation to fields in order to increase the fertility of soil.
					
					 Stockbreeding, fish farming and fruit production bases are conducting a scrupulous organizational and political work for establishing a Juche-oriented breeding system and embodying the principle of profitability for the purpose of making a tangible contribution to improving the people's living.
					
					 The workers in charge of the four vanguard sectors of the national economy, with a firm view that the development of light industry and agriculture depends on that of heavy industry, are making big strides in production and transportation.
					
					The Kim Chaek Iron and Steel Complex, a leading steel producer of the country, made the first tapping of the year successful and the Musan Mining Complex blew up 150,000 cubic meter earth on the first day of the year, thus adding to the conviction and optimism of the service personnel and people of the country.
					
					 Reports of such achievements have also come from the Pyongyang Thermal-power Complex, the Wonsan Youth Power Station and other power stations across the country and coal-industry and rail-transport sectors from the outset of the year.
					
					 Meanwhile, the builders of the Huichon Power Station are performing feats in the project in the spirit of having created "Huichon Speed", a new Chollima speed.

articles.title: Joint Editorial Studied Hard
articles.content:
Joint Editorial Studied Hard
 Pyongyang, January 5 (KCNA) -- The people of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea have studied hard the joint New Year editorial of the country's leading newspapers from the beginning of the year.
					 Upon receiving the joint editorial, which calls for making this a prosperous year full of the people's happiness, they are of a view that only when they grasp the ideas and contents of it, could they uphold the noble intention of the Workers' Party of Korea, which regards it as the overriding principle in its activities to improve the people's living standard steadily and spares nothing for them.
					
					 Mass media have repeated reporting the full text of the joint editorial or articles explaining the editorial for the purpose of helping the people in their study.
					
					 Officials of factories, enterprises and co-op farms throughout the country are striving to bring home the ideas and contents of the editorial to their people in various forms and methods.
					
					 In particular, those of the Kim Jong Suk Pyongyang Silk Mill, Kim Chaek Iron and Steel Complex, Songjin Steel Complex, Pyongyang Cornstarch Factory, Migok Co-op Farm in Sariwon City and Taedonggang Combined Fruit Farm are explaining the editorial to their employees in a profound way and encouraging them to launch a sweeping campaign to bring about a drastic turn in improving the people's living in the flames of the great revolutionary upsurge.
					
					 Passionate seminars on the editorial are held at working sites during breaks in combination with practice and people reading the editorial are seen in buses, subway cars and other public places.
					
					 Now the Korean people, who have launched this year's grand advance in order to make this year marking the 65th anniversary of the WPK a year of great changes to be recorded in the history of the building of a thriving nation, are in high spirits to usher in a heyday of prosperity unprecedented in the history of the nation by giving full play to the inexhaustible potentials of Songun Korea.

articles.title: Papers Call for Channeling Efforts into Improving People's of Living
articles.content:
Papers Call for Channeling Efforts into Improving People's of Living
 Pyongyang, January 5 (KCNA) -- Leading papers today editorially say that it is the main idea of the joint New Year editorial of the party, army and youth newspapers to bring about a radical turn in the improvement of the people's standard of living this significant year by accelerating the development of light industry and agriculture once again through an intensified drive for effecting a great revolutionary surge. They call for channeling all-Party, nationwide efforts into improving the people's standard of living.
					 Rodong Sinmun notes that it is the determination and intention of the Workers' Party of Korea to ensure that the achievements of the great upsurge are followed by greater ones and this significant year marking the 65th anniversary of the foundation of the Party becomes a prosperous year filled with the people's happiness by dynamically waging the all-Party, nationwide general offensive for the improvement of the people's standard of living.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 The joint editorial indicates tasks and ways such as the issue of increasing the state investment in the fields related to the people's living, the issue of sharply increasing the production in the sectors of basic industries, vanguards of the national economy, the issue of thoroughly enforcing the people-oriented policies of the Party and the state and the issue of pushing back the frontiers of science and technology in all fronts and leaping higher and faster this year.
					
					These reflect the stand of General Secretary Kim Jong Il on attaching importance to the people's living.
					
					 The on-going general offensive for the improvement of the people's standard of living is a drive sure to be crowned with victory as it reflects the realistic requirements for building a thriving nation.
					
					 The might of the country's economy, including the heavy industry, was increased through a high-pitched drive for effecting a great surge to lay a springboard for the country, already a politico-ideological and military power, to justifiably reach the status of an economic giant.
					
					 A great revolution will take place in improving the people's standard of living and the mettle of Songun Korea to achieve prosperity run higher when we accelerate the development of light industry and agriculture once again by channeling all-Party and nationwide efforts into it.
					
					 Minju Joson calls for waging a dynamic general offensive this year by dint of the single-minded unity of all the service personnel and people around Kim Jong Il and thus adorn the grand festival in coming October with laudable successes in the efforts to improve the people's standard of living and demonstrate once again to the whole world the dignity and might of Songun Korea.

articles.title: NA Passage of Bill on Overseas Troop Dispatch Blasted in S. Korea
articles.content:
NA Passage of Bill on Overseas Troop Dispatch Blasted in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, January 5 (KCNA) -- The Joint Conference of Civic and Public Organizations against the Renewed Troop Dispatch to Afghanistan of south Korea held a press conference in Seoul on Dec. 29 last year to denounce the passage of the bill on overseas troop dispatch through the puppet National Assembly.
					 The speakers at the press conference charged that it is an "unconstitutional bill" as it provides south Korea with conditions for hurling its military forces any time into a war of aggression even without any consent of the NA in case the UN requests the south Korean authorities to dispatch troops under the signboard of its "peace-keeping activities".
					
					 Recalling that south Korea has so far described its support to the U.S. in its war of aggression as an action taken to meet the "request of the UN," they deplored that if the NA is barred from performing its function concerning the troop dispatch, this will invite greater disasters.

articles.title: Abolition of Fascist Law Demanded in S. Korea
articles.content:
Abolition of Fascist Law Demanded in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, January 5 (KCNA) -- The preparatory committee of the Student Committee of the Youth and Students Solidarity for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration in south Korea issued a statement on Dec. 31 last year in denunciation of the puppet authorities' unwarranted suppression of a patriotic student.
					 The statement accused the puppet police of walking away by force on Dec. 30 Song Hyo Won, chairperson of the 13th-term (south) Korean Federation of University Student Councils (Hanchongryon) on the charge of violation of the draconic "National Security Law".
					
					 It is absolutely unpardonable that the puppet police have staged a campaign for arresting Song, keeping her on a "want list" for several years for the mere reason that she acted as chairperson of Hanchongryon though she struggled for justice and truth, it held, and continued:
					
					 Democracy has been stamped out under the present regime and a whirlwind of suppression is rampant on the strength of the NSL. The south Korean society today is a dark society under the reign of dictatorship where a mere talk about justice and truth is banned and all sorts of evil laws are in force.
					
					 The present regime would be well advised to bear in mind that the further it intensifies the crackdown upon the patriotic people by use of the dictatorial power, the deeper predicament it will find itself, the statement warned, demanding it immediately set free Song and repeal the NSL, an evil law dating back to the old era.

articles.title: DPRK Important Day Observed
articles.content:
DPRK Important Day Observed
Pyongyang, January 5 (KCNA) -- The Group of Youth for the Study of Kim Jong Il Juche Idea in Vienna, Austria issued a bulletin carrying a picture of the three commanders of Mt. Paektu on Dec. 24 last year on the occasions of the 18th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's assumption of the supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army and the 92nd birth anniversary of Kim Jong Suk, anti-Japanese heroine.
					 The bulletin in an article captioned "The KPA and Marshal Kim Jong Il" said that born in the secret camp in Mt. Paektu, Kim Jong Il grew up, receiving patriotic and revolutionary education from his parents, and fully acquired personality and quality as a brilliant commander.
					
					 The Songun politics pursued by Kim Jong Il true to the will of President Kim Il Sung is the political mode that defends socialism and dynamically pushes ahead with the revolution and construction with the army as a driving force, the bulletin said, adding:
					
					 The Songun politics helped strengthen the blood ties between the army and people and unite all members of the society around the Party and the leader as a powerful socio-political force, thus turning the DPRK into a steel-strong fortress that no force can dare provoke.
					
					 The bulletin in an article titled "Kim Jong Suk, Mother of Juche Korea" introduced her revolutionary life as a woman commander of Mt. Paektu.
					
					 The bulletin stressed that Kim Jong Suk brought up Kim Jong Il to be a dependable successor to the revolutionary cause of the President.

articles.title: Story of Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Story of Kim Jong Il 
Pyongyang, January 5 (KCNA) -- One day early in January Juche 95 (2006) General Secretary
					 Kim Jong Il visited an e-library newly built at Kim Chaek University of Technology. He stopped in front of an art work hanging on the wall of the first-floor hall.
					 The art work was depicting Kim Jong Il, who visited the university and met teachers, researchers and other staff members some years ago.
					
					 Looking at the art work in meditation, he told officials that President Kim Il Sung had visited Kim Chaek University of Technology and guided its work several times in his lifetime, attaching great importance to the university and that thanks to his wise leadership the university had turned into the highest seat for training scientists and technicians of the country.
					
					 He also said the revolutionary cause of the President should be carried forward with only him being venerated as eternal leader of the people and that doing so was the first and lofty duty of the Koreans. He then suggested in earnest that a photo or an art work of the President being among teachers and researchers of the university should be placed on the wall of the hall.
					
					 Hence an art work of the President opening up a grand vista for the development of the country's science and technology has been displayed in the hall.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il inspecciona subunidad de la division de tanques 105
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il inspecciona subunidad de la division de tanques 105
Pyongyang, 5 de enero (ATCC) -- El Dirigente  Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, inspecciono una subunidad adscrita a la Division Guardia de Tanques 105 "Seul" Ryu Kyong Su, laureada con el titulo de Septimo Regimiento de O Jung Hup.
					El Dirigente felicito a los uniformados quienes realizan orgullosos meritos cumpliendo su mision del ano nuevo con la nueva fe y aspiracion.
					
					Luego de averiguar como cumple su mision esa subunidad, recorrio la sala de educacion, el dormitorio, el comedor, el deposito de alimentos subsidiarios, el bano y otras facilidades de cultura, educacion e intendencia prestando profunda atencion a la labor y la vida de los militares.
					
					Dispenso gran amor y benevolencias por los uniformados averiguando todos los detalles de las condiciones de la vida de ellos como la situacion de uso de los medios culturales y educacionales, la temperatura del dormitorio, el suministro de agua al bano y las variedades de alimentos subsidiarios.
					
					Senalando que facilitar magnificas condiciones de vida a los soldados es una labor muy importante para incrementar la combatividad, subrayo que los oficiales de mando deben prestar siempre profunda atencion a las labores de intendencia. Seguidamente, el Comandante Supremo presencio un ejercicio de tanques desde el puesto avanzado de vigilancia.
					
					Al contemplar el entrenamiento intrepido de los tanquistas, se mostro muy satisfecho de que todos ellos hayan crecido como valientes combatientes, preparados firmemente en lo ideo-politico y en lo tecnico-militar y capaces de pelear a solas contra cien enemigos y de frustrar de un solo golpe la invasion de cualquier enemigo potente, y presento las tareas programaticas que serviran de guia para consolidar por todos los medios la combatividad de la unidad.
					
					Subrayo que la Division Guardia de Tanques 105 "Seul" Ryu Kyong Su, que cumplio el papel de cantera en el fortalecimiento de las fuerzas tanquistas del pais, ha sido siempre la unidad guardia tanto en el combate como en la idea.
					
					Gracias a las fieles unidades guardias como ella que defendieron resueltamente al partido y al lider, nuestra revolucion pudo avanzar siempre victoriosa superando todas las pruebas, afirmo.
					
					Expreso su gran esperanza de que los militares de la unidad realizaran brillantes meritos en su puesto de defensa a la patria, y se fotografio junto a ellos.
					
					Le acompanaron el general de ejercito del EPC Hyon Chol Hae y otros miembros de mando del ejercito.

articles.title: Rason fue designada como ciudad especial
articles.content:
Rason fue designada como ciudad especial
Pyongyang, 5 de enero (ATCC) -- El Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea emitio el dia 4 el siguiente decreto:
					1. Decide hacer de la ciudad de Rason la ciudad especial.
					
					2. El Consejo de Ministros de la RPDC y otros organos relacionados tomaran las medidas practicas para llevar a efecto ese decreto.

articles.title: Trabajadores coreanos estudian con afan editorial conjunto
articles.content:
Trabajadores coreanos estudian con afan editorial conjunto
Pyongyang, 5 de enero (ATCC) -- Los trabajadores coreanos acogieron el Ano Nuevo 99 (2010) de la Era Juche recibiendo con mucha emocion el editorial conjunto publicado por los periodicos Rodong Sinmun, Joson Inmingun y Chongnyon Jonwi con el mismo motivo.
					Este editorial conjunto exige convertir este ano significativo en el de prosperidad que traiga felicidad para el pueblo.
					
					Los trabajadores lo leen atentamente diciendo que han de saber bien su idea y contenido para acatar el noble proposito del Partido del Trabajo de Corea que no escatima nada para el pueblo presentando como maximo principio de sus actividades mejorar constantemente la vida del pueblo.
					
					Para aumentar la estudiosidad, los periodicos, la TV y las radios transmiten repetidamente el editorial conjunto y los articulos explicativos del mismo que contribuyen al estudio.
					
					Los funcionarios de las fabricas, empresas y granjas cooperativas de distintas localidades del pais dinamizan la labor organizativa y politica para dar a conocer a los trabajadores la idea y el contenido del editorial valiendose de diversas formas y maneras.
					
					Los funcionarios de la Hilanderia Kim Jong Suk de Pyongyang, el Complejo Siderurgico Kim Chaek, el Complejo de Acero de Songjin, la Fabrica de Elaboracion de Cereales de Pyongyang, la Granja Cooperativa de Migok de la Ciudad de Sariwon, la Granja Fruticola Combinada Taedonggang y otras unidades explican profundamente a los trabajadores el contenido del editorial redoblando el entusiasmo revolucionario y el espiritu de lucha de ellos que libran la ofensiva general para imprimir un cambio decisivo en la mejora de la vida del pueblo al promover con mas fuerza el gran auge revolucionario.
					
					Los trabajadores entablan durante los ratos de descanso al pie de sus centros de trabajo acalorados seminarios sobre el editorial en estrecha vinculacion con la practica.
					
					Se ven los trabajadores con el editorial conjunto en la mano en el trolebus, omnibus y vagoneta del metro, que les llevan y traen de los centros de trabajo, y tambien en otros lugares publicos.
					
					Ahora esta muy elevado el entusiasmo del pueblo coreano, que levantado en la solemne marcha para hacer brillar este ano del 65o aniversario de la fundacion del PTC como ano de grandes cambios que se registre en la historia de construccion de una gran potencia prospera, abre el periodo de plena prosperidad sin precedente en la historia nacional poniendo de manifiesto la inagotable potencialidad de la Corea del Songun.

articles.title: Periodicos abogan por editorial conjunto de Ano Nuevo
articles.content:
Periodicos abogan por editorial conjunto de Ano Nuevo
Pyongyang, 5 de enero (ATCC) -- Los periodicos capitalinos difundieron en sus ediciones de este martes editoriales que exhortan a concentrar las fuerzas de todo el partido y el Estado a la labor para la mejora de la vida del pueblo, destacando que el espiritu principal del editorial conjunto del Ano Nuevo publicado por los periodicos Rodong Sinmun, Joson Inmingun y Chongnyon Jonwi, es imprimir este ano significativo un cambio decisivo en la vida del pueblo dando otro acicate a la industria ligera y la agricultura al promover con mas fuerza el gran auge revolucionario.
					Desplegar con impetu una ofensiva general en escala de todo el Partido y el Estado por la mejora de la vida del pueblo, para extender la victoria del gran auge y convertir este ano del 65o aniversario de la fundacion del Partido en un ano de prosperidad que traiga felicidad para el pueblo, esto es la decision y proposito del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, senala el diario Rodong Sinmun y prosigue:
					
					Las tareas y medios presentados en el editorial conjunto, entre otros, el problema de aumentar este ano la inversion estatal en las ramas relacionadas con la vida del pueblo, el de producir un gran auge productivo en los sectores prioritarios de la economia nacional, los de industrias basicas, y materializar cabalmente las politicas populares del partido y el Estado y el de conquistar la cumbre tecnologica y saltar mas alto y rapido en todos los dominios, reflejan la posicion del Dirigente        Kim Jong Il de dar importancia a la vida del pueblo.
					
					La ofensiva general de hoy por la mejora de la vida del pueblo, siendo lucha con la posibilidad de victoria, refleja la demanda realista de la construccion de una gran potencia prospera. 
					
					   Al fortalecer mas el poderio economico del pais, sobre todo de la industria pesada, en medio del gran auge impetuoso, se ha preparado en nuestra patria el trampolin para saltar a la posicion de la potencia economica, como para completar su poderio de que hace gala como potencia politico-ideologica y militar.
					
					Si concentramos los esfuerzos de todo el Partido y el Estado para dar otro acicate a la industria ligera y la agricultura, se registrara una revolucion en la vida del pueblo coreano y se exaltara mas dignamente el impetu de gran prosperidad de la Corea del Songun. 
					
					   El periodico Minju Joson, a su vez, exhorta a desplegar con dinamismo la ofensiva general de este ano con el poderio de la unidad monolitica de miles y miles de militares y civiles unidos compactamente en torno al Dirigente para asi adornar con brillantez el gran festival de octubre con los exitos orgullosos en la mejora de la vida del pueblo y manifestar de nuevo a todo el mundo la dignidad y el poderio de la Corea del Songun.
